name: Black Works Studio - Killer Bee Yellow Jacket Connecticut - Petit Corona
brand: Black Works Studio, Killer Bee Yellow Jacket Connecticut
additionalNotes: The Killer Bee Connecticut is Blend-wise, it uses an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper with Ecuadorian maduro accents, a Nicaraguan habano binder and Nicaraguan fillers. While the original cigar featured accents near the cap and a closed foot, the new cigar has contrasting wrapper accents on both the cap and foot and the cap is now a swirl cap with a notably point.Â The base of the cigar is a mustard-brown Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper. On both the top and bottom of the cigar there are thin lines of a darker Ecuadorian wrapper, though the bottom stripes are a bit thicker.
